adjective.description: Of or relating to the former molluscan division Placophora, now usually identified with the class Polyplacophora, which comprises the chitons.

noun.description: A mollusc of the former division Placophora; a polyplacophoran.

origin: Late 19th century; earliest use found in The Century Dictionary. From scientific Latin Placophora, class or division name + -an. With use as adjective compare placophorous.
